comments.body: where do you check the internal boundaries of the `random_uniform` op?

check for boundaries had been added.  The original implementation only accept the default form of random_uniform, which boundary is [0.0, 1.0).  The updated implementation also accept the parameter form which compute the output of random_uniform with boundary value.   The updated implementation would check the parameter form and see whether the boundary value is still [0.0, 1.0).  This will make this optimization more adaptive.
See 

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/25384/commits/fa11069c3e85ffbcae19994bdba09c30eee0a6de#diff-ccdaa4724ea485e41d03d236b6ee46d0R202

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/25384/commits/fa11069c3e85ffbcae19994bdba09c30eee0a6de#diff-ccdaa4724ea485e41d03d236b6ee46d0R214

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/25384/commits/fa11069c3e85ffbcae19994bdba09c30eee0a6de#diff-ccdaa4724ea485e41d03d236b6ee46d0R220
